conversation.text: I just bought a new car
I just bought a new car but crashed it
The boss told me that they already found your replacement.
I think this is the year I finally start working out!
Man, I just cannot get myself to the gym lately.
I went for a run yesterday. It was the worst experience of my life.
How am I supposed to lose weight when they keep stocking donuts in the kitchen?
Working out is alright I guess. I know I should do it more, but meh.
I saw another demon at the gym bench 350lbs yesterday! Crazy right?!
Did you see the game last night? Terrible, right?
Did you see the game last night? Amazing, right?
Sports are just so boring. I can't get into them at all.
Wow! Aba! Have you been working out? You look great!
What a surprising win at yesterday's game, am I right?
What a surprising loss at yesterday's game, am I right?
Yesterday's match was outrageous. What was the ref doing?
You know, you're such a good listener. I really appreciate that about you.
Have you ever been to the Second Circle of Hell? Gets pretty wild at night...
You ever met an angel before? Complete and total nerds, man.
I don't get why the boss gets so mad at you. You clearly work hard around here.
This might come as a suprise to you, but I secretly love puppies. Don't tell anyone, ok?!
Psst... I heard there's a secret fight club in the Seventh Circle. Keep it quiet, alright?
Honestly, Aba, you really ought to try and work a little harder. It's embarrassing.
I really think I'm gonna win the lottery this time around. I can feel it!
Man, I'd burn this place to ground if everything else in Hell weren't already made of fire.
Don't take this the wrong way, but I think you're a pretty decent person, Aba.
Don't take this the wrong way, but I think you're a pretty awful person, Aba.
Hey! Hey! If you're paying attention to me, make a smiley face. Do it now.
Hey! Hey! If you're paying attention to me, make a angry face. Do it now.
Do you ever feel like you're not in control of your actions? Like you're just a badly drawn character in a video game?
So uh, yeah. How, uh, how about that weather, right?
Just broke up with that lower demon of torment I'd been seeing. You know, the one covered in hooks? I'm really tore up about it.
I don't know. Sometimes you torment souls, and sometimes the souls torment you, am I right?
I swear if I have to file one more report I'm gonna wreck up this miserable office!
Boring boring boring. Everything about this place is just so boring, ya know?
You'll never believe this! Some guy named Dante and an old dude who went by Virgil came by my lair last night!
You look tired today, Aba. Are you tired?
Torture just doesn't seem to make me as happy as it used it. Just feels unfullfilling, you know?
Do you think you could help me move a couch later on this week? We just need to take it down a couple thousand flights. No big deal.
Deep down, I kind of wish I was a demon of sloth too. I respect the sin.
Hey, I heard a rumor someone in the office is totally into you!
Hey, I heard a rumor someone in the office has a big grudge against you!
One of these days, I swear I'm gonna finish my novel. Don't worry, you'll get a credit in the intro.
One of these days, I swear I'm gonna let the boss really know what a jerk he is!
I made a blood souffle the other night, but it settled wrong in the oven and tasted nasty...
I was so depressed until I saw you today. Now I'm even more depressed.
I was so depressed until I saw you today. Now I'm feeling a bit better, buddy!
I feel a little blah today to be honest. Not great, not terrible.
Do you think it's weird we all speak English? Shouldn't we be talking in Latin or Aramaic or something?
